metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46341 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in X.Org. This security flaw occurs because the handler for the XIPassiveUngrab request accesses out-of-bounds memory when invoked with a high keycode or button code. This issue can lead to local privileges elevation on systems where the X server is running privileged and remote code execution for ssh X forwarding sessions.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs xwayland package contains parts of xorg-server This is ZDI-CAN-19381

criterions.comment: xorg-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
xorg-server-hwe-16.04: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
